author: joeyaiello
body:
Currently, launching `powershell` shows a product name and copyright notice:

```
Windows PowerShell
Copyright (C) 2016 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
```

At the very least, we should change `Windows PowerShell` to `PowerShell`, and we should look into whether we can remove the Copyright notice with LCA as well. 

If there are any other instances of "Windows PowerShell" branding throughout the project, we should remove those as well before launch.
